synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validation and providing concrete, actionable micro-strategies. Its main weakness is a one-size-fits-all approach, often mismatching advice with a student's personality or anxiety level. To improve, it must first diagnose individual traits (e.g., introvert/extrovert, anxiety level) before tailoring strategies, prioritizing strengths and simple actions over complex reframing. The highest priority is evolving beyond generic support to provide truly personalized, adaptive guidance.
